item.title: vRA 7.x Reclamation Machine Usage Thresholds
item.description: In vRealize Automation 7.x, you can discover Deployments for reclamation in the Administration > Reclamation > Deployments (Tenant Administrator) view or the Administration > Reclamation > Tenant Machines (IaaS Administrator) view. The Advanced Search feature can be selected clicking > in the top right corner and you can search for VMs with Low or High CPU usage along with several other options. But what are the actual thresholds that vRA uses when you select "Low CPU"?
